question.text:
Match the following column I with column II and choose the option with the accurate matches.

  Column I   Column II
(a) Operator site (i) The binding site for RNA polymerase
(b) Promoter site (ii) The binding site for repressor molecule
(c) Regulator gene (iii) Codes for protein/enzyme
(d) Structural gene (iv) Codes for repressor molecule

<math><mtable><mtr><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></mtd><mtd><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd><mtd><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></mtd></mtr></mtable></math>

solution.text:
Column I   Column II
(a) Operator site (ii) The binding site for repressor molecule
(b) Promoter site (i) The binding site for RNA polymerase
(c) Regulator gene (iv) Codes for repressor molecule
(d) Structural gene (iii) Codes for protein/enzyme
